attributes.action: Legislate to stop the persecution of English people and Culture.
attributes.additional_details: No other portion of society has been so persecuted and attacked by National Government and Local Government than the English people and our Culture. It must end. We have a human right to be proud of history, heritage and to raise our flags and say we are proud to be English. Our communities have the right to same funding and support as any other. The same rights freedoms and respect. Anti English hate must end.
attributes.background: Local and National government have institutionally been persecuting the English people and our culture for more than 20 years. From our flags to our free speech we have been attacked. Targeted diversity has blocked English people from jobs within the public sector.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
